attributes.additional_details:
Unemployment benefit should be earned through local work-placement, community work placements. volunteering police, ambulance, local government, hospital.

The government should offer mandatory work-placements.

This would give unemployed people self confidence, get people into routine for work.(eg work by 9-5)

Stop anti social behaviour and life-style benefits. Employers like people with work skills & some kind of experience.

Within 2 weeks they should be forced to carry out voluntary work
